pageProps.title: whatlies
pageProps.teaser: Make interactive visualisations to figure out 'what lies' in word embeddings.

data.title: whatlies
data.slogan: Make interactive visualisations to figure out 'what lies' in word embeddings.
data.description: This small library offers tools to make visualisation easier of both word embeddings as well as operations on them. It has support for spaCy prebuilt models as a first class citizen but also offers support for sense2vec. There's a convenient API to perform linear algebra as well as support for popular transformations like PCA/UMAP/etc.
data.author: Vincent D. Warmerdam
